articles.title: Willie McGinest shares how his No. 55 became an iconic piece of USC, Patriots history
articles.description:
McGinest originally earned the number after Junior Seau at USC. Later, the linebackers had a full circle moment with it.

The post Willie McGinest shares how his No. 55 became an iconic piece of USC, Patriots history appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Willie McGinest discusses the legacy of his No. 55 jersey in Boston sports history.
McGinest originally received No. 55 at USC after legendary player Junior Seau.
The jersey symbolizes a connection between USC and the New England Patriots for fans.

articles.title: Patriots’ Mike Vrabel reportedly received pointers from Bill Belichick and a rival coach ahead of Super Bowl LX
articles.description:
Vrabel is also reportedly leaning on offensive coordinator Josh McDaniels's experience.

The post Patriots’ Mike Vrabel reportedly received pointers from Bill Belichick and a rival coach ahead of Super Bowl LX appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mike Vrabel seeks advice from Bill Belichick before Super Bowl LX on February 12, 2026.
Vrabel also consults rival coach Andy Reid for strategic insights.
Josh McDaniels' experience is crucial for Vrabel's game planning, impacting local fan expectations.
